text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock When will the MSM media start to hear  what the Health Secretary said? That there will be capacity to test 100,000 per day for all tests including the antibody test. I understand that 80,000 plus people were tested yesterday  - the figures aren’t in for today yet
